meanings.definition: A small, usually metal compartment for storing personal belongings
meanings.sent1: I keep my books in the school locker.
meanings.sent2: The gym locker room is where we change for PE class.
meanings.sent3: The locker was so full of snacks, it looked like a mini grocery store!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a locker of memories, each one carefully stored away.
meanings.sent5: The locker door creaked open, revealing a hidden treasure inside.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that locks
meanings.sent1: The locker of the team, he always made sure everything was secure.
meanings.sent2: The locker of secrets, she held onto the key tightly.
meanings.sent3: The locker of mysteries, always keeping us guessing.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a locker, guarded and protected from harm.
meanings.sent5: The locker of time, ticking away the moments of the day.
